Package tpl.dbms

Rigorous Two Phase Locking DBMS package

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Item
    Interface that represents a database item, it keeps information like: item identifier (key), value, lock state, read_timestamp, write_timestamp, transactions holding this item and transactions waiting for it.
    Operation
    Represents a database operation, it includes: transaction id, operation type & item.
    Transaction
    Represents a database transaction.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BufferPool
    Buffer Pool Class.
    DBMS
    Class of a DataBase Management System (DBMS) capable to simulate the behavior of processing a schedule of transaction operations.
    DBMSThread
    A DBMSThread is the thread of execution in the DBMS, able to simulate the behavior of processing a sequence of transaction operations.
    ItemImpl
    Implementation of Item Interface.
    Log
    Handles all log messages.
    OperationImpl
    Implements interface Operation.
    ScheduleParser
    Parser of (basic) database schedules; including operations like begin transaction, end transaction, write item & read item.
    TransactionImpl
    Implements Transaction interface.
    TransactionImpl.PQsort  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LockState
    Lock state of a database item.
    OperationType
    Types of transaction operations.
    TransactionState
    States of a transaction.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OperationException
    Custom Exception to handle errors involved while processing a database operation

Package tpl.dbms Description

Rigorous Two Phase Locking DBMS package
